author: Special Correspondent
text:
BJP national president Amit Shah, on Saturday, announced that Tamilisai Soundarajan will continue as the party’s Tamil Nadu chief.

However, the press release announcing Mr. Shah’s decision did not mention if this was a new term for Ms. Tamilisai or if it was a mere extension of the current tenure.

A fresh term would mean she would be at the helm for the next three years.
title: Tamilisai to continue as State BJP chief
